chapter.title: 安装运行
chapter.literallayout:
安装插件 http://getbootstrap.com/getting-started/
http://www.bootcss.com/p/font-awesome/
网格 列宽 .col-xs- Extra small devices Phones (<768px) .col-sm- 750px ~62px Small devices Tablets (≥768px) .col-md- 970px ~81px Medium devices Desktops (≥992px) .col-lg- 1170px ~97px Large devices Desktops (≥1200px)
